bibl.title: Despatch from W. H. Randall to Frederick W. Seward, March 14, 1878
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p:
United State Consulate at Sierra Leone
March 14th 1878

Mr W.H. Randall
to Department of State

Subject
To have copies of despatches that did not reach the department

Abstract of Contents
Acknowledgement of receipt of Dispatch No 21 dated 6th February. Numbers of dispatch of which copies are sent

United States Consulate
Sierra Leone 14th March 1878

I have the honor to own receipt of your dispatch No 21, dated 6th February, and in conformity with your request send you herewith copies of my dispatches Nos 17, 21, 22 and 23, the originals not having reached the Department of State.

I have the honor to remain
Sir
Your obedt Servant
W H Randall Consul
div1.fw:
The honorable
F. W. Seward
Assistant Secretary of State
div1.p:
Inclosure
Copies of Dispatches Nos 17, 21, 22 and 23.
